uncategorized.description: Topics that do not strictly fit in with any existing categories
handle.description: This category can be followed from the open social web via the handle %1
poll:no-options-error: Please add at least one poll option
poll:create-poll-description: Create a new poll for the community to vote on
poll:title: Poll Title
poll:title-help: Choose a clear, concise title for your poll
poll:description-placeholder: Provide additional context or details about the poll (optional)
poll:description-help: Optional: Add more details to help people understand what they're voting on
poll:allow-revote: Allow users to change their vote
poll:allow-revote-help: If enabled, users can change their vote after submitting
poll:end-date-help: Optional: Set when the poll should close for voting
poll:anonymous-voting-help: If enabled, votes will be anonymous and not show who voted for what
poll:options-help: Add at least 2 options for people to choose from
poll:min-options-error: Please provide at least 2 poll options
poll:end-date-future-error: End date must be in the future
no-topics:
There are no topics in this category.
Why don't you try posting one?
no-followers: Nobody on this website is tracking or watching this category. Track or watch this category in order to begin receiving updates.
watching.description:
Notify me of new topics.
Show topics in unread & recent
not-watching.description: Do not show topics in unread, show in recent
ignoring.description: Do not show topics in unread & recent
watching.message: You are now watching updates from this category and all subcategories
tracking.message: You are now tracking updates from this category and all subcategories
notwatching.message: You are not watching updates from this category and all subcategories
ignoring.message: You are now ignoring updates from this category and all subcategories
